text:
02:53

Red Carpet The Cast of 'IT' On The Red Carpet The cast of 'IT' talks with MTV News on film nominations, how big the film has turned out to be, and more!
title: Chris Pratt Is Our Generation Award Recipient

meta_data.description: Chris Pratt accepts the 2018 MTV Movie & TV Award Generation Award and shares nine important tips for his fans to remember.
